QuoteText: C'mon, Freedom. I've had you on "ignore" for months, but I get the gist of it. It's obvious that here you've been reduced to nothing but a source of condescendinging amusement. Am I right, or am I right? The horse you're flogging is beyond dead, it's friggin decayed. Hey, it's the nature of the beast, forums like this. Look at Easyrider, who's become the religious joke everyone--quite rightly, too--heaps scorn upon . You bucking for his spot... the religious loon every one takes potshots at? Didn't think so. If you really, sincerely, truly believe what you've been posting here, go to a moderated site like EvC Forum or Evolution Fairytale Forum , and show us all up by engaging THEM in a "formal" debate." They'll be more than happy to oblige you. And after you've displayed your mettle with the big boys, you can come back here with a plethora of triumphant links under your arm and make us eat our atheistic, rational humanistic words, whereby we'll all bow down to the superiority of your fallacious, irrational "arguments."
